text: Ojo mardumi Makka dar taaççuʙand, az in ki ʙar marde az xudaşon vahj kardem, ki mardumro ʙitarson va mū'minonro muƶda deh, ʙa in ki dar nazdi Parvardigoraşon pojgohi ʙalande dorand? Pas, cun Rasuli Alloh ʙarojaşon vahji ilohiro tilovat kard, kofiron guftand, ki in Muhammad (sallallohu alajhi va sallam) çodugarest oşkoro
